title: Culture Club: a kiss across the ocean
creator_credit: Virgin Vision, Keefco Productions, Hugh Symonds and Keef
brief_description: Recorded live at Hammersmith Odeon, December 1983. The charismatic Boy George and his band Culture Club perform some of their most loved songs in this very enjoyable and entertaining concert. The band, made up of Boy George, Jon Moss, Roy Hay, and Mikey Craig are supported by the fabulous Helen Terry as back-up vocal.
